web_snippets: Evelyn McDonnell is an American writer and academic. Writing primarily about popular culture, music, and society, she helped to forge a new kind of feminism.
Biography. Professor of Journalism Evelyn McDonnell is an expert on music, gender, and politics. She has written or coedited six books, from Rock She Wrote ...
Hachette Book Group is a leading book publisher based in New York ... Evelyn McDonnell is associate professor of journalism at Loyola Marymount University.
